name: Planeticus
description:
Planeticus is a multiplayer 2D space strategy game. The most enjoyable experience will be achieved in the company of friends!


Exchange spaceships for the right to own the desired planets and receive random resources for your collection. You can transfer resources between your planets, increasing armor or for other purposes.




By collecting all 5 types of resources on one planet, you will turn it into a super planet that will begin to generate ships for you.




Will you send spaceships to attack or protect the necessary planets?




Build walls between planets to protect yourself from enemies. You can also build them unexpectedly to instantly destroy enemy ships. It all depends on your ingenuity!




The size of the map is determined by the number of players. Each game will give you a different list of planets. All planets will have a random name, map position, appearance, and resource element. Also, players are given a random home planet at start and there will always be a different distance between players. More accidents to the god of accidents!


Who are you: a pathetic space worm or a respected ruler of the galaxies?
